      • defaultFormat

        public static java.lang.String defaultFormat(java.lang.String value,
                                             int type)
        This function re-formats the format in filter expressions to comply with the format used by the database. This is the default implementation of the functionality, most commonly used by SQL dialects.

      • pollForResult

        public static <T> T pollForResult(Nest nest,
                                  QueryRunner queryRunner,
                                  java.util.concurrent.Future<T> future)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                  java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                                  com.rapidminer.operator.ProcessStoppedException
        Waits for the result to be delivered by the Future object. Periodically checks, whether the process was cancelled and cancels the Future task in that case.
        Parameters:
        nest - nest the Nest, which needs the database table action. Must not be null.
        queryRunner - QueryRunner object for execute DB query. Must not be null.
        future - the task to execute.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if error occurs during DB operations.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if execution is interrupted.
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        com.rapidminer.operator.ProcessStoppedException
